casebody.data:
OCEAN HILL
v.
CURRITUCK BOARD OF COMM. No. 382P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 15, 2006. John R. Wester, Jonathan C. Krisko, Charlotte, Thomas P. Nash, IV, C. Everett Thompson, II, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill I Prop. Owners Asso. Katherine F. McKenzie, Raleigh, for Currituck County Bd. of Comm.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of August 2006 by NC Association of County Commissioners for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of August 2006."
